channel.title: azumino on Barefoot Rob

item.title: wasabi place
item.description: 16:51 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST We are on the way home now after having gone to a wasabi restaurant and museum next to a wasabi farm and a river of clear water. Actually two adjacent rivers, one of which seemed to be slightly higher than the other.
